name: Tonk The Wreckoning
description:
A university project that received a 1st. I am uploading it in the state it was submitted and looking for advice and recommendations on how I can improve the game, constructive criticism is always welcome.

The game is about a tank crew left alone to fight off the advancing airforce of the enemies, and your job is to shoot down the planes. Occasionally you will receive a helping hand.

All assets bar the ground, flowers and backgrounds were made by myself.
